name: Alexandros Bouras
story: Vasilis was born and raised in Greece. He joined the military at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional marksmanship skills. He was recruited into BLUFOR and has since completed numerous successful missions. Vasilis is very methodical, always taking the time to analyze every situation before making a move. He is married with two children and worries about them constantly when he is away on missions.
